actions.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

purpose: Page 95, after line 15, insert the following (and redesignate subsequent sections accordingly):    SEC. 137. NATIONAL WATER-BASED FREIGHT POLICY.    (a) In General- It is the policy of the United States to improve the condition and performance of the national water-based freight network to ensure that such network provides the foundation for the United States to compete in the global economy and achieve each goal described in subsection (b). ***.
